verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:23
verses.text: And he gave Joshua the son of Nun a charge, and said, Be strong and of a good courage: for thou shalt bring the children of Israel into the land which I sware unto them: and I will be with thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:24
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Moses had made an end of writing the words of this law in a book, until they were finished,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:25
verses.text: That Moses commanded the Levites, which bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord, saying,
